financialSupport.title: Ukusekela Kwezimali
financialSupport.description: Thola izeluleko zokutshala imali ezilungiselelwe wena futhi uye ezingqungqutheleni zezimali eziqinisayo.

gbvSupport.title: Ukusekela kwe-GBV
gbvSupport.description: Thola usekelo olusheshayo nezindawo zokuphephela ezivikelekile lapho uzidinga kakhulu.

sanitaryAid.title: Usizo Lokuhlanzeka
sanitaryAid.description: Thola amabhokisi okunikela aseduze futhi ufinyelele izinsiza zokuhlanzeka ezibalulekile.

aiAssistant.title: Umsizi we-AI
aiAssistant.description: Thola izimpendulo ezisheshayo nokuqondiswa kusistimu yethu yosekelo ehlakaniphile.

submitRequests.title: Thumela Izicelo
submitRequests.description: Thumela futhi ulandelele izicelo zakho zosekelo ngesistimu yethu elula ukuyisebenzisa.

aboutUs.title: Ngathi
aboutUs.description: Funda kabanzi ngomgomo wethu wokuqinisa abesifazane kulo lonke iNingizimu Afrika.

cta.title: Usukulungele Ukuqala?
cta.description: Joyina izinkulungwane zabesifazane abathole usekelo nokuqiniswa ngenkundla yethu.

requests.title: Imibuzo Yosizo
requests.subtitle: Thumela imibuzo emitsha futhi ulandelele leyo eseyikhona
requests.noRequestsDesc: Qala ngokuthumela isicelo sakho sokuqala sosizo
requests.name: Igama

req001.description: Ngifuna izeluleko zokutshala imali ebhizinisini elincane

req003.description: Ngifuna amabhokisi okupha aseduzane ezinto zokuhlanzeka

finance.title: Ukuqinisa Ngezimali
finance.subtitle: Thola izeluleko zezimali ezilungiselelwe wena, zibandakanyeke emihlanganisweni yezimali eqinisayo, futhi wakhe indlela yakho yezomnotho

seminar1.title: Abesifazane Ebhizinisini: Ukuqala Uhambo Lwakho Lwezimali
seminar1.description: Funda izisekelo zokutshala imali nokuthi ungaqala kanjani ukwakha ingcebo yakho yesikhathi esizayo.

seminar2.title: I-Workshop Yokuzimela Ngezimali
seminar2.description: Amasu asebenzayo okufeza ukuzimela ngezimali njengowesifazane ozimele.

seminar3.title: Ukubala Imali Nokonga Kwabesifazane Abazimele
seminar3.description: Amakhono abalulekile okubala imali namasu okonga alungiselelwe abesifazane abazimele.

emergencyFund.title: Yakha Isikhwama Sesimo Esiphuthumayo
emergencyFund.description: Qala ngokonga izindleko zezinyanga ezi-3-6 ezimweni ezingalindelekile.

education.title: Tshala Imali Emfundweni Yezimali
education.description: Ulwazi lunamandla. Funda ngokubala imali, ukutshala imali, nokuhlela imali.

diversifyIncome.title: Hlukanisa Imali Engenayo Yakho
diversifyIncome.description: Yakha imithombo eminingi yemali engenayo ukwandisa ukuqina kwezimali.

retirement.title: Hlela Umhlalaphansi Kusenesikhathi
retirement.description: Uma uqala kusenesikhathi, imali yakho inesikhathi esinganeno sokukhula.

trackExpenses.title: Landelela Izindleko Zakho
trackExpenses.description: Ukuqonda ukuthi imali yakho iya kuphi kuyisinyathelo sokuqala sokulawula imali.

sanitaryAid.title: Usizo Lokuhlanzeka & Ukusekela Impilo
sanitaryAid.subtitle: Thola izinto zamahhala zokuhlanzeka nezidingo zempilo emabhokisini ethu okupha eNingizimu Afrika

capeTown.name: Isikhungo Somphakathi saseKapa
capeTown.address: 123 Main Street, Cape Town, Western Cape
capeTown.description: Isikhungo esikhulu somphakathi esihlinzeka ngezinto ezibalulekile zokuhlanzeka kubesifazane bendawo.

johannesburg.name: Isikhungo Sabesifazane saseJozi
johannesburg.description: Isikhungo esizinikezele ekusizeni abesifazane ngezinto zokuhlanzeka nosizo.

durban.name: Isikhungo Sezempilo saseThekwini
durban.description: Isikhungo sezempilo esihlinzeka ngezinto zokuhlanzeka nemfundo yezempilo.

tips.tip1: Shintsha amaphedi noma ama-tampon njalo ngemahora angu-4-6
tips.tip2: Geza izandla zakho ngaphambi nangemva kokusebenzisa izinto zenyanga
tips.tip4: Gcina imikhiqizo engakasebenziswa endaweni eyomile, epholile

tips.tip1: Geza umzimba wonke nsuku zonke ngensipho emsulwa
tips.tip3: Gcina indawo yakho yangasese ihlanzekile futhi yome
tips.tip4: Phuza amanzi amaningi futhi udle ukudla okunomsoco

tips.tip1: Amalaphu ahlanzekile angasetshenziswa njengenye indlela yesikhashana
tips.tip2: Ukudla okufudumele kungasiza ukunciphisa ubuhlungu benyanga
tips.tip4: Funa usizo lwezingcweti uma kunezinkinga ezingajwayelekile

donation.title: Nikela Izinto
donation.description: Samukela iminikelo yezinto zokuhlanzeka ukusiza abesifazane bendawo. Lezi yizinto ezidingeka kakhulu:

gbvSupport.title: Usizo lwe-GBV & Izindawo Zokuphepha
gbvSupport.subtitle: Thola usizo olusheshayo, izindawo zokuphepha eziphephile, nezeluleko zezingcweti zokudlula udlame lwesidalwa
gbvSupport.emergencyAlert: Uma usesimweni esiphuthumayo, shayela 10111 noma 112 ngokushesha

safeShelters.title: Izindawo Zokuphepha Eziphephile
safeShelters.subtitle: Izindawo ezifihlakele zokuphepha zabesifazane abadinga indawo yokuphepha

safeHaven.name: Indawo Yokuphepha ye-Safe Haven
safeHaven.services: Indawo yokuhlala, ukudla, ukusekela kwengqondo, usizo lwezomthetho
safeHaven.description: Indawo yokuphepha ye-24/7 yabesifazane abadinga indawo yokuphepha ngokushesha.

newBeginnings.name: Isikhungo se-New Beginnings
newBeginnings.services: Indawo yokuhlala yesikhashana, ukuqeqeshwa komsebenzi, imfundo yezingane
newBeginnings.description: Isikhungo esisiza abesifazane nokwakha ukuzimela kwabo.

hopeCentre.name: Isikhungo se-Hope Centre
hopeCentre.services: Ukusekela kwengqondo, ukuqeqeshwa kwezomthetho, usizo lwezempilo
hopeCentre.description: Isikhungo esinikeza ukusekela okugcwele kubesifazane abahluphekile.

emergencyContacts.title: Oxhumana Nabo Esimweni Esiphuthumayo
emergencyContacts.subtitle: Izinombolo zokushayela uma udinga usizo ngokushesha

legalResources.title: Ukusekela Kwezomthetho
legalResources.subtitle: Thola ulwazi ngamalungelo akho nokuthi ungathola kanjani usizo lwezomthetho

legalAid.title: Legal Aid South Africa
legalAid.services: Ukuqeqeshwa kwezomthetho, ukumelwa emakhotini, ukusekela kwezomthetho

supportGroups.title: Amaqembu Okusekela
supportGroups.subtitle: Xhumana nabanye abesifazane abadlule izinto ezifanayo

tips.tip2: Tshela omunye umuntu lapho uya khona
tips.tip3: Gcina inombolo yokushayela yesimo esiphuthumayo ilungile
tips.tip4: Themba imizwa yakho - uma kubonakala kungaphephile, suka

tips.tip1: Sebenzisa amaphasiwedi aqinile futhi uwashintje njalo
tips.tip3: Yazi ukuthi ungakwazi kanjani ukufihla indawo yakho
tips.tip4: Sebenzisa i-browser ye-private mode uma ufuna usizo

tips.tip2: Gcina imali, amadokhumenti, nezingubo ezindaweni ezifihlakele
tips.tip4: Hlela indawo yokuphepha lapho ungaya khona

aiAssistant.title: Umsizi we-AI
aiAssistant.subtitle: Buza imibuzo yakho futhi uthole izeluleko ezilungiselelwe wena
aiAssistant.welcomeMessage: Sawubona! Ngingumsizi wakho we-AI. Ngingakusiza kanjani namhlanje?

mockResponses.response1: Ngiyaqonda! Singakusiza ngemihlangano yezimali ehlukahlukene. Bheka ikhasi lethu le-Finance ukuthola ulwazi olugcwele ngemihlangano ezayo.
mockResponses.response2: Ukuphepha kwakho kubalulekile. Singakusiza ngezindawo zokuphepha eziphephile, izinombolo zesimo esiphuthumayo, nokusekela kwezomthetho. Bheka ikhasi lethu le-GBV Support.
mockResponses.response3: Sinamabhokisi okupha imikhiqizo yokuhlanzeka kuyo yonke iNingizimu Afrika. Bheka ikhasi lethu le-Sanitary Aid ukuthola indawo eseduzane nawe.
mockResponses.response4: Singakuxhumanisa nosizo lwezomthetho lwamahhala. I-Legal Aid South Africa inikeza usizo lwamahhala kubesifazane abadinga. Shayela 0800 110 110.
mockResponses.response5: Uma usesimweni esiphuthumayo, shayela 10111 (amaphoyisa) noma 0800 428 428 (GBV Command Centre) ngokushesha. Ukuphepha kwakho kubalulekile.

footer.disclaimer: Umsizi we-AI uyasiza kodwa awuthathi indawo yokuqeqeshwa kwezingcweti. Uma udinga usizo lwesimo esiphuthumayo, xhumana nezingcweti.

about.title: Nge-EmpowerHub
about.subtitle: I-EmpowerHub iqinisa abesifazane eNingizimu Afrika ngokunikeza izeluleko zokutshala imali ezilungiselelwe wena kanye nemibono, ukusekela okusheshayo kwe-GBV kanye nezindawo zokuphephela eziphephile, kanye nokufinyelela emabhokisini okunikela okokuhlanzeka. Lesi yisixazululo esihlanganisiwe esibonisa ukuzinikela kwethu ekuqiniseni ukuzimela, ukuphepha, nesithunzi.
about.missionText: Ukudala ipulatifomu ehlanganisiwe eqinisa abesifazane eNingizimu Afrika yonke ngokunikeza izinsizakalo zokusekela eziphelele ezibhekene nokuzimela ngezimali, ukuphepha komuntu, kanye nezidingo zokuqala zokuhlanzeka esixazululweni esisodwa esingafinyeleka.

financialEmpowerment.title: Ukuqinisa Ngezimali
financialEmpowerment.description: Izeluleko zokutshala imali ezilungiselelwe wena, imibono yezimali, kanye nezinsiza zokwakha ukuzimela komnotho.

gbvSupport.title: Ukusekela kwe-GBV
gbvSupport.description: Ukusekela okusheshayo kanye nezindawo zokuphephela eziphephile kwabesifazane ababhekene nodlame olusekelwe ebulilini.

sanitaryAid.title: Usizo Lokuhlanzeka
sanitaryAid.description: Ukufinyelela emikhiqizweni yokuhlanzeka ebalulekile ngamabhokisi okunikela abekwe ngobuchule.

empowerment.title: Ukuqinisa
empowerment.description: Sikholelwa ekuqiniseni ukuzimela kwabesifazane ngemfundo, izinsiza, nokusekela.

safety.title: Ukuphepha
safety.description: Ukuqinisekisa ukufinyelela okusheshayo ezindaweni eziphephile nokusekela kwabesifazane ezimweni zenkinga.

dignity.title: Isithunzi
dignity.description: Ukunikeza izinsiza ezibalulekile kuyilapho kugcinwa isithunzi nobumfihlo bomfazi ngamunye.

community.title: Umphakathi
community.description: Ukwakha inethiwekhi eqinile yokusekela ngezinyathelo eziqhutshwa umphakathi nokubambisana.

about.techDescription: I-EmpowerHub isebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje ukunikeza ipulatifomu yokusekela ehlanganisiwe. Umboniso wethu wamanje ubonisa isikhombimsebenzisi nezici eziyinhloko, kanye nezinhlelo zokuhlanganisa izici ezithuthukisiwe ezihlanganisa:

futureFeaturesList.metamask: Ukuhlanganiswa kwe-MetaMask ukuze kube nokuthengiselana okuphephile

about.demoNote: Lolu mboniso ubonisa umqondo wesixazululo esihlanganisiwe, esihlanganiselwe ukuvumela ukuthuthukiswa okuzimele kwezici kuyilapho kugcinwa ulwazi lomuntu osebenzisayo oluhambisanayo. Ukwakheka okuyizingxenye kuvumela ukuthuthukiswa kwekusasa ngaphandle kokuphazamisa ukusebenza okuyinhloko.
